{{Description|It was from the time that gods first traced the lights in the heavens with their eyes that the notion of "fate" was born.}}
'''Stellaris Phantasm''' is [[Mona]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|Hydro Application on Cast|2.5|3|Illusory Bubble Explosion DMG}}
* Illusory Bubble and Omen are both applied upon casting Stellaris Phantasm.
* When Illusory Bubble is active on an enemy, there is a constellation-like marking on that enemy. When Omen is active on an enemy, there is a starry purple aura around that enemy.
* Stellaris Phantasm applies {{Color|Wet}} twice: once when cast, and once when the Illusory Bubble bursts.
* Hits that do not deal [[Poise Damage]] will not burst the bubble.
* If no outside source bursts the bubble, it automatically bursts after 8 seconds.
* Omen status timer only starts after the bubble bursts. Since Omen is applied from the initial cast of the skill, if the bubble lasts for its whole duration (8s), Omen can have a maximum duration of 13s.
* {{TalentNote|character=Mona|talent=Stellaris Phantasm|no snapshot|Illusory Bubble Explosion DMG}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|1|Prophecy of Submersion|increases Electro-Charged DMG, Vaporize DMG, Hydro Swirl DMG, and Frozen duration by 15% when any of the player's own party members hits an opponent affected by Omen.}}
*{{TalentNote|constellation|3|Restless Revolution}}
*{{TalentNote|constellation|4|Prophecy of Oblivion}}
